seo.title: Pricing - DEFFATEST AI Testing Platform
seo.description: Choose the perfect DEFFATEST plan for your testing needs. Start free, upgrade anytime.

introText: Experience the power of AI-driven testing. Start free, upgrade anytime to unlock unlimited potential.

pro.name: Pro
features: Advanced bug reports with AI insights

manual.title: Manual QA Team
manual.description: A typical QA team of 2 full-time testers costs $150,000+ annually in salaries, benefits, and overhead.

deffatest.title: DEFFATEST Chaos Plan
deffatest.description: Our Chaos plan costs just $4,200 annually with unlimited tests, 8 concurrent slots, and API access.

savings.description: Plus, our AI finds more bugs, tests faster, and never needs vacation time.

questions.question: Can I change plans later?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

questions.question: How are tests counted?
questions.answer: Each test submission counts as one test. Test counts reset monthly on your billing date.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards and PayPal through our secure payment processor, Paddle.

questions.question: Is there a refund policy?
questions.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee if you haven't run any tests. Contact support for details.

ctaSection.heading: Ready to Transform Your QA Process?
ctaSection.text: Start with our Free plan today, no credit card required.
